mapper.select: select a.Date from ( select curdate() - INTERVAL (a.a + (10 * b.a) + (100 * c.a)) DAY as Date from (select 0 as a union all select 1 union all select 2 union all select 3 union all select 4 union all select 5 union all select 6 union all select 7 union all select 8 union all select 9) as a cross join (select 0 as a union all select 1 union all select 2 union all select 3 union all select 4 union all select 5 union all select 6 union all select 7 union all select 8 union all select 9) as b cross join (select 0 as a union all select 1 union all select 2 union all select 3 union all select 4 union all select 5 union all select 6 union all select 7 union all select 8 union all select 9) as c ) a where a.Date between #{startDate} and #{endDate}
select count(*) from tb_company where state=2 and date_format(entry_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{date}
select count(*) from tb_company where state=2 and date_format(entry_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{date}
